name: SnowReportforApexMountain
0:
”Alexa, open Apex Mountain”
”Alexa, ask Apex Mountain for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Apex Mountain for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: apex mountain
des: The Apex Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
